name: Christmas Puzzles Free
description:
Christmas is one of the most magical holidays of the year. It brings so much gratitude, happiness and surprises. The magic lies with all the small things, exchanging gifts, decorating homes and the Christmas tree with colorful lights, sharing meals with family and friends and makes us cherish life, believe in wonders and dream. Santa Claus is one of the faces of this holy tradition. Santa and his gifts are one of things that every child loves about Christmas. And what else do children like? Playing games!
Our jigsaw puzzle has a Christmas theme and pictures of Santa, gifts, Snowman, reindeer, jingle bells and all other symbols of the holiday. Xmas is here, let’s play together!
The Christmas Jigsaw Puzzles has built in gallery with high definition photos. Pick a picture from the Christmas Puzzle gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle. If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle.
As soon as you are done putting back the pieces in right order you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster.
You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and bring some of the Christmas spirit on your device.
Christmas jigsaw puzzle is suitable for toddles, preschool kids and grown-ups. Just enable the Kids mode from the menu and Christmas puzzle will become easier for young players. Jigsaw puzzles are great for developing motor skills, hand-to-eye coordination skills, imagination, creativity and image recognition. The big selection of pictures and difficulty levels can keep your child busy for a long time.
Santa, Snowman and all other characters and symbols of Christmas will put your children in a happy Christmas mood.

The puzzle features:
* It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode);
* Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a gallery;
* Different difficulty levels;
* Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device);
* Game timer;
* Share result or picture;
* Multitouch zoom and piece rotation;
* Zoom In & Zoom Out;
* Pieces can rotate;
* Save game;
* Best score statistics;
* Set picture as wallpaper;
* Nice background Christmas music;
* Magical sound effects;
* Vibration on piece merge;
* Kids mode – makes it easier for young players.
* The Christmas jigsaw puzzles is free.

Merry Christmas!
